about_the_game:
Alien Grounds: FPS Challenge

Survive relentless robotic waves in this high-speed sci-fi FPS! Arm yourself with devastating alien weaponry and fight for survival in dynamic, ever-changing battlefields. Every shot counts—can you outlast the onslaught?

Mission

The challenge starts easy, but don’t get comfortable. Each wave grows deadlier, forcing you to adapt, scavenge, and fight smarter. Use the brief pauses between battles to reload, find supplies, and prepare for the next attack.

Score System

Every kill counts! Earn points for eliminating enemies, completing waves, and landing headshots, knockbacks, or phantom kills. But beware—revives come at a cost. Perfect your aim, master your skills, and climb the leaderboard!

Dynamic Maps

No two battles are the same! Maps shift and evolve as the fight progresses, transforming from dark, ominous arenas to bright, scenic landscapes. Adapt to your surroundings or use the Portal to lock in your favorite battlefield.

Do you have what it takes to survive the onslaught and dominate the battlefield? Jump into Alien Grounds and prove it. Good luck, soldier!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-4170 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 / RX 470 / Intel Arc iGPU or Radeon 680M (4GB VRAM reserved)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel i5-12400F / AMD Ryzen 5 5600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 / RX 6600
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
